AUTO2000 TOYOTA SURABAYA

SELAMAT DATANG DI WEBSITE KAMI

Toyota Surabaya Dari AUTO2000 bersama dengan saya Faiz, Siap Melayani Anda Dengan Kemudahan Dalam Proses Pembelian Mobil Toyota Untuk Wilayah Surabaya dan Sekitarnya Dengan Proses Mudah, Aman, Terpercaya, Serta Dengan Banyak Kelebihan Lainnya. Pelayanan untuk wilayah Jawa Timur dan sekitarnya. Nantikan banyaknya promo-promo menarik!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://wasap.at/YCO7M5″ button_text=”Whatsapp” button_alignment=”right” button_alignment_tablet=”right” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#E02B20″ button_border_color=”#000000″ button_icon=”||fa||400″ button_icon_placement=”left” button_on_hover=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”tel:+6282234200093″ button_text=”Telepon” button_alignment=”left” button_alignment_tablet=”left” button_alignment_phone=”center” button_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_color=”#000000″ button_border_color=”#FFFFFF” button_icon=”||divi||400″ button_icon_placement=”left” button_on_hover=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_toggle title=”1. Keuntungan Langsung yang bisa Anda dapatkan :” open=”on” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_background_color=”#E02B20″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#E02B20″ title_level=”h4″ title_font=”|700|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”5px||5px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

✅ Servis berkala dengan rutin sebanyak 7x dalam 3thn/60.000km

✅ Maka akan mendapatkan warranty tambahan selama 1thn atau 20.000 km. All Model kecuali LCGC, Dyna dan Transmover.

✅ Garansi Mesin 3th atau 100.000 km

✅ Garansi ACCU 1th atau 10.000 km

✅ Proses mudah dan cepat.

✅ Bebas Pelanggaran Wilayah JATIM

✅ Menerima Tukar Tambah Mobil(All Merk)

✅ Free Member ASTRAWORLD 5th.

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”2. Kemudahan Pesan Mobil Toyota di Auto2000 :” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_background_color=”#E02B20″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#E02B20″ title_font=”|700|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”5px||5px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

✅ Proses Cepat & Mudah.
✅ Bisa Trade In ( Tukar Tambah).
✅ Proses STNK/NOPOL Lebih cepat.
✅ Melayani seluruh area Jatim ( Tanpa biaya Tambahan).
✅ Ditangani dan dibantu Langsung Oleh Wiraniaga / Sales Toyota Profesional (Faiz).

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”3. Dokumen & Syarat Pengajuan Kredit Mobil Toyota :” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_background_color=”#E02B20″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#E02B20″ title_font=”|700|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”5px||5px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  •  (Uang Tanda Jadi Rp.5.000.000,-)
  • Foto Copy KTP (Kartu Tanda Penduduk).
  • Foto Copy KK (Kartu Keluarga).
  • Foto Copy NPWP (Nomor Pokok Wajib Pajak).
  • Foto Copy PBB Rumah, Rekening listrik, rekening air.
  • Foto Copy Buku tabungan 3 bulan terakhir.
  • Foto Copy Slip Gaji(Karyawan) / Nota Usaha (wirausaha).

[/et_pb_toggle][et_pb_toggle title=”4. Tips Bagi Anda Sebelum memesan Kendaraan / SPK” open_toggle_text_color=”#FFFFFF” open_toggle_background_color=”#E02B20″ closed_toggle_background_color=”#FFFFFF” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” title_text_color=”#E02B20″ title_level=”h6″ title_font=”|700|||||||” title_font_size=”18px” body_text_color=”#FFFFFF” body_line_height=”1.3em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

  1. Sebelum melakukan transaksi dengan Sales Toyota, Ajaklah untuk bisa bertemu.(cobalah atur janji terlebih dulu bersama Sales Toyota).
  2. Dalam setiap transaksi Keuangan, pastikan selalu dibayarkan ke rekening atas nama perusahaan (PT.ASTRA INTERNATIONAL TBK.) Atau transaksi langsung di dealer Auto2000 Pecindilan.
  3. Pastikan Wiraniaga / Salesman Toyota bisa memberikan informasi transparan muali dari harga mobil, Simulasi kredit (Nilai DP, Jenis Asuransi, Nilai Angsuran, Serta tenor).
  4. Sales Toyota benar-benar bisa Anda andalkan serta memiliki rasa tanggung jawab mulai dari proses pemesanan kendaraan Toyota, hingga delivery unit (serah terima kendaraan).
  5. Pembelian Toyota percayakan selalu kepada Auto2000 dengan Wiraniaga Toyota / Sales Toyota Terbaik dan berpengalaman Sdr. Faiz.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.toyotasurabayasale.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/toyotasurabayasale.com-Logo-639-×-1200-px.jpg” alt=”toyota surabaya sale” title_text=”toyotasurabayasale.com – Logo (639 × 1200 px)” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#3a3a3a” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|800|||||||” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Promo Toyota Surabaya

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.toyotasurabayasale.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/Banner-Toyota-600×600-1.jpg” alt=”Promo toyota surabaya” title_text=”Banner Toyota 600×600″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjEwOSJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Cek Harga / Price List” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”default” background_layout=”dark” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”|800|||||||” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Serah Terima Mobil – Toyota Surabaya

meta._et_pb_old_content:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
